narrative:
This inspection was a prelicense #2. Items noted in prelicense #1 have been addressed and facility in in
compliance. 
Applicant is submitting paperwork to convert from Class A to Clas B and is ready to be licensed. 
No regulated activity may be conducted by the applicant until a USDA license is issued. 
Inspection and exit interview conducted with applicant.

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
